blogPost.excerpt: Make boring meetings a thing of the past. Engage your audience and energize participants with live polls, quizzes, word clouds, Q&A's and new slide layouts. Creating an entire slide deck in Mentimeter has never been easier or more beautiful!
blogPost.body: Make boring meetings a thing of the past. Engage your audience and energize participants with live polls, quizzes, word clouds, Q&A's and new slide layouts. Creating an entire slide deck in Mentimeter has never been easier or more beautiful!
blogPost.title: Mentimeter Layouts - Create interactive presentations that stands out.
blogPost.author: Johannes Ridderstedt

localize.description: 让无聊的会议成为过去。通过现场投票、测验、文字云、问答和新的幻灯片布局，让您的听众参与进来，激发参与者的活力。在Mentimeter中创建一个完整的幻灯片从来没有如此简单或更漂亮
localize.tagline: 创建突出的交互式演示。

localize.description: 讓無聊的會議成爲過去。通過現場投票、測驗、文字雲、問答和新的幻燈片佈局，讓您的聽衆參與進來，激發參與者的活力。在Mentimeter中創建一個完整的幻燈片從來沒有如此簡單或更漂亮
localize.tagline: 創建突出的交互式演示。

previous.excerpt: Think “Cards Against Humanity” meets Microsoft Paint. Now add an AI as the judge. Paint.wtf challenges you to draw your best on zany prompts and then be scored by an AI. See if you can rank atop the global leaderboard. A new prompt is released every 2 hours!
previous.title: paint.wtf - A drawing game where an AI is the judge

localize.description: 想想 "纸牌反人类 "与微软绘画的结合。现在添加一个AI作为裁判。Paint.wtf 挑战你在滑稽的提示上画出你最好的作品，然后由人工智能打分。看看你是否能在全球排行榜上名列前茅。每2小时发布一次新的提示!
localize.tagline: 一个人工智能作为裁判的绘画游戏

localize.description: 想想 "紙牌反人類 "與微軟繪畫的結合。現在添加一個AI作爲裁判。Paint.wtf 挑戰你在滑稽的提示上畫出你最好的作品，然後由人工智能打分。看看你是否能在全球排行榜上名列前茅。每2小時發佈一次新的提示!
localize.tagline: 一個人工智能作爲裁判的繪畫遊戲

next.excerpt: ZujoNow Webinar provides SDK for in house scalable webinar development. It broadens your reach with a capacity of more than 1k participants.
next.title: Zujo Now Webinar - Build scalable and engaging video experiences

localize.description: ZujoNow网络研讨会为内部可扩展的网络研讨会开发提供SDK。它扩大了您的覆盖面，可容纳1k以上的参与者。
localize.tagline: 构建可扩展和吸引人的视频体验

localize.description: ZujoNow網絡研討會爲內部可擴展的網絡研討會開發提供SDK。它擴大了您的覆蓋面，可容納1k以上的參與者。
localize.tagline: 構建可擴展和吸引人的視頻體驗
